subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The International Association of Athletics Federations, which governs track and field, is investigating what sanctions it can take against the former Olympic champion Marion Jones after she admitted taking steroids before the 2000 Sydney Games.
snippet: The International Association of Athletics Federations, which governs track and field, is investigating what sanctions it can take against the former Olympic champion Marion Jones after she admitted taking steroids before the 2000 Sydney Games.
